entry.title: GoCD on Kubernetes using Terraform
entry.content: Use Terraform scripts to setup GoCD on Google Kubernetes Engine in minutes.

entry.title: Configuring GoCD Agents in Kubernetes
entry.content: If your pipelines involve creating a docker image and pushing it to a registry/repository, you can use the above steps to create an Artifact Store with that registry.

entry.title: Configuring Google Container Registry (GCR) as an Artifact Store in GoCD
entry.content: If your pipelines involve creating a docker image and pushing it to a registry/repository, you can use the above steps to create an Artifact Store with that registry.

entry.title: Running Dockerized GoCD Containers as Non Root
entry.content: To provide addition security against container(s) achieving escalated permissions on the host node, GoCD supports running container(s) using a Non root user.

entry.title: Effect of Java licensing changes on GoCD
entry.content: Due to Java licensing changes by Oracle, GoCD's support for Java is changing.

entry.title: Installing and Configuring GoCD on GKE using Helm
entry.content: Understand the steps needed to install and configure GoCD on GKE using Helm while looking at the possibility of migrating your CI/CD infrastructure to Kubernetes

entry.title: Use OpenLDAP for User Authentication in GoCD
entry.content: Understand more about how to use OpenLDAP and authenticate and scale your users in GoCD

entry.title: Continuous Delivery Metrics Part 3: How long does it take to get from committing code to production?
entry.content: This is the third post in the series - Actionable Continuous Delivery Metrics. Here we'll analyze lead time, the duration of time it takes to deployment
